actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the fourth Sunday in November in each year as "John Fitzgerald Kennedy Day".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the fourth Sunday in November in each year as "John Fitzgerald Kennedy Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to proclaim the fourth Sunday in November in each year as "John Fitzgerald Kennedy Day".
